Posts.EditableText:
Why can't we delete published games?

I'm trying to test a game, and would like to get rid of my old test games, so that I know the one I'm testing is the right one.

I have six games published for testing, but it doesn't seem to matter how many additional ones I publish, there's only ever six??

They're all set to private if that makes any difference.

Posts.EditableText: One day I'll add the ability to delete your own games, but until then, if you email me the links I'll delete them for you.
Posts.HTML: One day I'll add the ability to delete your own games, but until then, if you email me the links I'll delete them for you.
